item.title: Officials ID person who rented Cybertruck used in explosion outside of Las Vegas Trump hotel
item.description: Authorities are working to establish whether there is a connection between the blast on New Year's Day outside of the hotel and the deadly pedestrian ...

item.title: Tesla shares slide after it reports first drop in annual deliveries
item.description: Tesla's fourth-quarter deliveries report follows a huge late-year rally in the stock that lifted its gain for 2024 to 63%.

item.title: Sugar Bowl postponed one day following deadly New Orleans attack
item.description: The College Football Playoff quarterfinal game between Georgia and Notre Dame will take place on Thursday at 3 p.m. Central time at the Superdome.

item.title: These airlines were the most on time in 2024
item.description: Supply chain issues and strong travel demand continued in 2024.

item.title: These restaurant chains closed locations in 2024
item.description: Wendy's, Applebee's and Red Lobster were among the chains that announced restaurant closures in 2024.
